name: Modern Education and Research Institute
goal:
The MERI works to help university professors and administration members to modernise education through studying innovative methods and approaches to teaching and learning and disseminating knowledge through academic exchange programmes, scientific conferences and international cooperation projects.
We aim to:
1. Develop, implement and further enhance effective cooperation and sustainable partnerships in the academic sector between the countries of the European Union (EU) and Eurasian Economic Union (EEU) by bringing the best European practices and expertise to the EEU universities.
2. Inform the EEU higher education institutions about the new learning opportunities in the EU tailored to the specific needs as a response to contemporary challenges in education.
3. Promote the European initiative of life-long learning.
4. Strengthen educational partnerships and create a platform for sharing best practices and expertise.
5. Monitor and assist universities in building consortiums for the EU funded programmes.
6. Provide high-quality expertise on modernization of higher education and foster quality teaching and university management in the EEU.
interests: Business and Industry, Culture, Education and training, External Relations, Research and innovation, Youth
